org.spongepowered.api.event.block

Interface NotifyNeighborBlockEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Event

    public interface NotifyNeighborBlockEvent
extends Event, Cancellable
    Called when a block triggers an update to neighboring {link BlockType}s in one or more Directions. There is a way to mark an "update" as being "invalid" or "cancelled": filterDirections(Predicate) will apply a Predicate such that if the predicate returns false, the Direction will be removed from the getNeighbors() map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filterDirections(Predicate<Direction> predicate)
      Filters out Directions of the BlockStates to be marked as "valid" after this event.
      Map<Direction,BlockState> getNeighbors()
      Gets an immutable Map of Direction to BlockState of the BlockType that will be notified of an update.
      Map<Direction,BlockState> getOriginalNeighbors()
      Gets the immutable Map of Direction to BlockState of the BlockType that would normally be notified of changes.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCause, getContext, getSource

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Cancellable

        isCancelled, setCancelled

    • Method Detail

      • getOriginalNeighbors

        Map<Direction,BlockState> getOriginalNeighbors()
        Gets the immutable Map of Direction to BlockState of the BlockType that would normally be notified of changes.
        Returns:
        The original directions map

      • getNeighbors

        Map<Direction,BlockState> getNeighbors()
        Gets an immutable Map of Direction to BlockState of the BlockType that will be notified of an update. If a Direction is not required or needing to be excluded from an update, filterDirections(Predicate) will perform that exclusion.
        Returns:
        The map

      • filterDirections

        void filterDirections(Predicate<Direction> predicate)
        Filters out Directions of the BlockStates to be marked as "valid" after this event. If the Predicate.test(Object) returns false, the BlockState is removed from getNeighbors() map.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The predicate to use for filtering.
